intro: Psychotria minima, commonly known as the dwarf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is a low-growing shrub with small, elliptic leaves and produces clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests and undergrowth. The plant has been studied for its potential pharmacological properties due to the presence of alkaloids.
